definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: body, self, height, elevation (cf. NH [[גּוּף]])—sg. sf. [[גַּפּוֹ]] Ex 21:3, Ex 21:3, Ex 21:4; pl. cstr. [[גַּפֵּי]] Pr 9:3; —
body, self, only in phr. [[יׇבאׁ]] [[בְּגַפּוֹ]] ([[יֵחֵא]])) he shall come in (go out) by himself (with his body) Ex 21:3, Ex 21:3, Ex 21:4; in law of slave (cf. Di).
